A 12-inch yoga wheel is a great size for someone of your height, 5'8"! Here's why:

**General Guidelines:**

* For yogis under 5'6", a 10-inch wheel is usually recommended.
* For yogis between 5'6" and 5'10", a 12-inch wheel is a good fit.
* For yogis over 5'10", a 15-inch wheel might be more suitable.

**Why a 12-inch wheel is suitable for you:**

* A 12-inch wheel will provide a comfortable and stable surface for your body, allowing you to maintain proper alignment and engage your core.
* It's large enough to support your body weight and provide the necessary leverage for deeper stretches and more challenging poses.
* The 12-inch diameter will also give you enough room to move your body around the wheel, making it easier to transition between poses and maintain flow.

**Considerations:**

* If you're looking for a more intense stretch or deeper compression, a smaller wheel (10-inch) might be a better option.
* If you're planning to use the wheel for more restorative or yin yoga practices, a larger wheel (15-inch) might provide more comfort and support.

Ultimately, the best wheel size for you will depend on your personal preference, practice style, and goals. However, a 12-inch wheel is a great all-around size that will provide a solid foundation for your yoga practice.

Remember to always listen to your body and adjust your practice accordingly. Happy practicing!
